trends: There have been no other sightings in Raceland
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailson april 30th around noon ,i was on my way on a by pass country road to pay a bill. on the way back we had bad weather so i took a picture of the cloulds . not that i saw something but just because i take a lot of pictures of clouds. when i got home i looked at the picture and saw the light first. then i looked to the left in the clouds and enlarged it and saw a object that was rectangle and large. if you inlarge it and lighten it and shadow it you can see it real good. looks wierd .the light was a stright beam of light.
Summary: took picture of clouds and saw beam of lightand enlarged the cloulds to the left and saw something in the cloulds.
